resources.string: Start typing for find your locationâ€¦

WeatherInformation is a simple forecast app, which uses some APIs to fetch current weather forecast data from the \'"https://openweathermap.org/api\'" and to fetch places,cities,counties,coords etc.. The main goal of this app is to be a sample of how to build an high quality Android application that uses the Architecture components, Hilt, Corotunies, Repository patter, Navigatin component etc. in Kotlin.
